metadata.name: Gaia DR3 default
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3, with a good balance between good distances and number of stars. Contains all stars with up to 20%/1.5% bright/faint parallax relative error, and all Hipparcos stars.
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains a selection of DR3 and all Hipparcos stars.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are derived from parallaxes (d=1000/plx).
- Parallaxes are using the corrected terms.
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 bright
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3 with the brightest stars in the catalog. Contains all stars with up to 90%/1% bright/faint parallax relative error, and all Hipparcos stars.
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains a selection of DR3 and all Hipparcos stars.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are derived from parallaxes (d=1000/plx).
- Parallaxes are using the corrected terms.
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 RUWE
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3. Contains the stars for which the RUWE (re-normalized unit weight error) is <= 1.4, and all Hipparcos stars.
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains a selection of DR3 and all Hipparcos stars.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are derived from parallaxes (d=1000/plx).
- Parallaxes are using the corrected terms.
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 bayesian distances
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3. Contains all stars with bayesian distances as determined by Bailer-Jones et. al., and all Hipparcos stars
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains all DR3 and all Hipparcos stars with 3D positions.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are from Bayler-Jones et.al.
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 fidelity
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3. Contains all stars for which the fidelity value is > 0.5, and all Hipparcos stars.
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains a selection of DR3 and all Hipparcos stars.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are derived from parallaxes (d=1000/plx).
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 photometric distances
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3. Contains all stars with photometric distances from GSP-Phot Aeneas best library using BP/RP spectra, and all Hipparcos stars.
metadata.releasenotes:
- Fix Cartesian proper motion axis orientations.
- Contains a selection of DR3 and all Hipparcos stars.
- The cross-match table used is in the archive.
- Distances are from the distance_gspphot column in the archive.
- Extinction and reddening corrections are applied to magnitudes and colors.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 extra small
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3 with a tiny number of stars. Contains all stars with up to 2%/0.015% bright/faint parallax relative error, and all Hipparcos stars.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 tiny
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3 with a tiny number of stars. Contains all stars with up to 1%/0.01% bright/faint parallax relative error, and all Hipparcos stars.

metadata.name: Gaia DR3 weeny
metadata.description: Star catalog based on Gaia DR3 with only the very best stars in terms of parallax relative error. Contains all stars with up to 0.8%/0.01% bright/faint parallax relative error, and all Hipparcos stars.
